structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 41, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 1, effective March 3, 2000; and ch. 218, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 606, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 227, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982; and ch. 377, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 13, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 3.
